headline: Could fewer foreign visitors help ease U.S. inflation?
summary: Investing.com -- A decline in inbound tourism may help cool U.S. inflation by dampening demand in key services sectors, according to analysts at Capital Economics.

headline: Former Expedia CEO Peter Kern to rescue Italian lingerie company La Perla
summary: Italy's troubled luxurylingerie company La Perla will be rescued and taken over byPeter Kern, the former chief executive of U.S. travel technologycompany Expedia, the Italian government said on...

headline: EXPE Q1 Earnings Call: U.S. Travel Weakness Offsets International B2B and Advertising Growth
summary: Online travel agency Expedia (NASDAQ:EXPE) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025 as sales rose 3.4% year on year to $2.99 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.47 per share was 31% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Former Expedia CEO Peter Kern to buy Italian lingerie company La Perla
summary: ROME -Peter Kern, the former chief executive of U.S. travel technology company Expedia, will buy troubled Italian luxury lingerie company La Perla, Italy's industry minister said on Tuesday. ...
